pages.title: Wild Bactrian Camel
pages.text: The wild Bactrian camel ($(o)Camelus ferus$()) is a critically endangered species of camel living in parts of northwestern China and southwestern Mongolia.$(br2)It is closely related to the Bactrian camel ($(o)Camelus bactrianus).

pages.title: Wild Bactrian Camel
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cactus$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 13 Days
